section.p: Due to an increase in the chocolate price on the world market, prices of all boxes must be increased by 10%.

ol.li: Start by making a backup or copy of the table or of the entire database.
Design an update query to implement the price increase. Name the query quer028 and execute it.Be aware that each time you execute the query, the prices are further increased by 10%.

section.title: Solution
section.p: Create through Query Design a new query, add table Boxes, and add field BoxPrice. Change Query Type in Update. Enter in field Update To the value [BoxPrice]*1.1.
